channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JCRVLT-664] Potential NPE in JcrNodeTypeMetaDataImpl.fulfillsNodeDefinition
item.description:
Due to the missing null check on effectiveNodeType the following NPE might be observed for child nodes whose effective node cannot be determined (e.g. no node type definition found for the given primary/mixin type). This happens only below a node whose node types requires children of a certain type.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
